meta.title: Grovyn | Software Engineering That Lasts
meta.description: We build reliable software systems for growing businesses. Clear architecture, dependable execution, and technology that works.

hero.subtitle: Grovyn helps teams build software systems that are designed to stay reliable as products and businesses scale. We focus on clear architecture, maintainable code, and technology choices that age well.

metrics.title: How we work
metrics.subtitle: We focus on clear communication, realistic timelines, and building systems that continue to work well as your business grows.
metrics.deliveries_desc: We deliver digital systems with care, structure, and accountability. Early-stage startup, founded Dec 2025.
metrics.pricing_desc: Scope, responsibilities, and costs defined upfront. No surprises.
metrics.global_delivery_desc: Teams collaborate across regions with consistent communication and shared standards.
metrics.mvp_desc: Stable foundation delivered in this timeframe once scope and priorities are clear.
metrics.quality_desc: Structured support after delivery for stability and a smooth handover.
metrics.ownership_desc: All code, systems, and deliverables belong to you. No dependency, no hidden control.

testimonials.title: Built for teams that need technology they can depend on
testimonials.subtitle: We work with businesses that take their software seriously and need systems that remain stable, clear, and dependable over time.

contact.sidebar_subtitle: Ready to discuss your technology needs? Reach out through any of these channels or fill out the form.
contact.response_note: We respond to all inquiries within 24 hours (usually within 4 hours during business hours).
contact.subtitle: Share what you are planning to build. We will help you think through the scope, technical considerations, and whether working together makes sense.
contact.confidential_desc: Everything we discuss is treated as confidential from the first conversation.
contact.nda_desc: We are comfortable signing standard or custom non-disclosure agreements when required.
contact.no_sales_desc: You will speak directly with the people responsible for designing and building the system.
contact.your_info_sub: Help us understand who you are
contact.project_goal_sub: What are you looking to build?
contact.details_sub: Tell us more about your needs
contact.brief_placeholder: What are you trying to build? What challenges are you facing?
contact.success_message: Someone from our team will reach out within 24 hours to discuss your project.
contact.validation_required: Please fill in your name and email before sending.

footer.tagline: We build software systems that stay reliable as businesses grow. Clear architecture, maintainable code, and technology choices that age well.

cookie_consent.message: This website stores cookies on your computer. These cookies are used to collect information about how you interact with our website and allow us to remember you. We use this information in order to improve and customize your browsing experience and for analytics and metrics about our visitors both on this website and other media. To find out more about the cookies we use, see our Privacy Policy.
cookie_consent.decline_note: If you decline, your information won't be tracked when you visit this website. A single cookie will be used in your browser to remember your preference not to be tracked.
cookie_consent.necessary_desc: Required for the site to function and to remember your choices. Cannot be disabled.
cookie_consent.analytics_desc: Help us understand how visitors use our website so we can improve it.
cookie_consent.marketing_desc: Used to deliver relevant content or ads. We do not sell your data.

about.subtitle: Grovyn helps teams build software that stays reliable and maintainable as products and businesses scale.
about.philosophy_desc: We focus on clear architecture, maintainable code, and technology choices that continue to work well as systems grow. No shortcuts that create problems later.
about.clean_code_desc: Code that other people can understand and maintain
about.cloud_native_desc: Built for cloud platforms that scale smoothly
about.data_security_desc: Security practices built in from the start
about.transparency_desc: You'll know what's happening with your project.
about.reliability_desc: Technology that continues to work as you grow.
about.user_flow_desc: Products that make sense to the people using them.
about.cta_subtitle: Tell us what you're building and we'll help you understand what's involved.
about.code_metric_label: Lines of code shipped each month
about.page_hero_subtitle: Grovyn exists to help teams design and maintain software that remains clear, stable, and dependable as businesses grow. We focus on thoughtful engineering, practical decision-making, and long-term technical confidence.
about.founder_quote_1: Trust is the most valuable thing in the world.
about.founder_quote_2: It must be earned and carefully upheld.
about.founder_blockquote: At Grovyn, we believe trust is built through integrity, consistency, and doing the right thing even when it is harder. It is earned over time and forms the foundation of everything we build and every partnership we commit to.
about.process_3_activity_1: Sign contract and first milestone payment
about.process_4_activity_3: Daily progress updates and feedback loops
about.process_5_outcome: System live with full ownership transferred.
about.process_6_outcome: Continued support and peace of mind.
about.story_para_1: Grovyn began with a simple intention: to make engineering smoother, more reliable, and easier to scale for growing teams.
about.story_para_2: We saw founders and businesses spending too much time managing complexity instead of building what truly mattered. Engineering felt heavy, slow, and fragmented. Decisions made early often became obstacles later.
about.story_para_3: We set out to change that.
about.story_para_4: Today, we help teams simplify their engineering journey through clean software, well-structured systems, and practical AI automation. From core product development to LLM-powered workflows, our goal remains the same: reduce friction, improve clarity, and build technology that works well today and continues to work as teams and products grow.
about.story_para_5: Grovyn is built on the belief that good technology should support progress, not slow it down.
about.grow_1_desc: We prioritise steady, responsible growth over rushed outcomes.
about.grow_2_desc: We build healthy systems, teams, and partnerships designed to last.
about.grow_3_desc: We set high standards and take full responsibility for meeting them.
about.grow_4_desc: We work closely with our customers, building alongside them with openness and respect.
about.win_1: We succeed when our clients succeed.
about.win_3: When technology becomes a strength, not a bottleneck.
about.conversation_para: If you're planning a product or improving an existing system, we're happy to talk through the technical considerations and see whether working together makes sense.
about.delivery_sub: A documented, predictable process. Six steps from first call to ongoing support.

careers.subtitle: We're looking for people who care about writing good code and building systems that last.
careers.hero_subtitle: We work with people who care about building reliable systems and taking ownership of their work. Our teams value clarity, thoughtful decision-making, and long-term responsibility over quick wins.
careers.one_team_subtitle: We focus on building good software and supporting each other along the way.
careers.no_open_roles_message: Check back later or get in touch—we'd love to hear from you.
careers.why_join_subtitle: We create an environment that supports focused, thoughtful work and long-term growth.
careers.detail_mission_body: We're looking for someone who can help us build reliable software for growing businesses. You'll work directly with our team and our clients to understand what they need and build systems that solve real problems.
careers.detail_message_placeholder: Tell us why you're interested in this role and what experience you bring.
careers.detail_resume_browse: or click to choose a file
careers.detail_success_message: We'll review your application for {title} and get back to you within a few days.
careers.culture_subtitle: We focus on clear communication, realistic timelines, and giving people space to do good work.
careers.remote_desc: Work from where you're most productive. We focus on what you build, not where you sit.
careers.rhythm_desc: We try to plan work in a way that doesn't require long hours or weekend work.
careers.agency_desc: When you're responsible for something, you make the decisions.
careers.trust_desc: You'll know what's happening and why.

openings.title: Senior Full-Stack Engineer
openings.description: We need someone who can build web applications end-to-end. You'll work with React, Node.js, and cloud infrastructure.
requirements: Have shipped products that people use

openings.title: Mobile Developer (Flutter)
openings.description: Help us build mobile apps for iOS and Android using Flutter.
requirements: Understanding of native iOS and Android
Have shipped apps to the App Store and Play Store
Can write code that other people can maintain

openings.title: DevOps Engineer
openings.description: Help us keep our systems running reliably. You'll work with cloud infrastructure, deployment automation, and monitoring.
requirements: Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure)
Know how to work with Kubernetes and containers

openings.title: Product Designer
openings.description: Design interfaces and experiences for web and mobile products. Work closely with engineers and clients.
requirements: Experience with Figma or similar tools

careers.form_subtitle: Tell us about yourself and what kind of work you're looking for.
careers.technical_brief_placeholder: What have you built? What are you good at? Link to your work if you have it.
careers.resume_hint: or click to choose a file
careers.success_message: We'll review your application and get back to you soon.

items.title: Clear timelines
items.description: We'll tell you upfront how long things will take and keep you updated along the way.

items.description: You'll know what something costs before we start. No surprise invoices or hidden fees.

items.title: Production ready
items.description: What we build is tested, documented, and ready to deploy.

items.title: You own everything
items.description: All code and assets belong to you. No proprietary frameworks or vendor lock-in.

items.title: Global team
items.description: We work across time zones with clear communication.

items.title: 90-day support
items.description: After launch, we'll help fix issues and make adjustments.

ai_section.para1: When AI makes sense for your product, we build it into the architecture from the start. This means it works reliably and can be maintained like the rest of your system.
ai_section.para2: We focus on practical applications where automation and intelligence add clear value without creating unnecessary complexity.

infrastructure_detail.template_expert_para: We help teams plan and manage infrastructure that stays reliable as systems grow. Clear architecture, good monitoring, and technology choices that age well.
infrastructure_detail.template_cta_quote: Let's talk about your infrastructure needs and how we can help.

cloud.title: Cloud
cloud.subtitle: Whether you're on AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud-we help you get there and keep everything running smoothly so your team can focus on building.
cloud.banner_tagline: Migration, optimization, and day-two operations on AWS, Azure, and GCP-so you can focus on building, not infrastructure.

process_steps.title: Assessment
process_steps.desc: We take a close look at what you have today and design a migration path that fits your timeline and risk tolerance.

process_steps.title: Migration
process_steps.desc: We move your workloads in phases so your business keeps running-no big-bang cutover unless you want one.

process_steps.title: Operation
process_steps.desc: Once you're on the cloud, we help you run it well: cost control, reliability, and clear visibility.

cloud.trust_bar_text: Trusted by growing businesses and SaaS companies to move and run workloads on AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud.
cloud.expert_heading: Cloud infrastructure that fits your business
cloud.expert_para: We help teams design and operate cloud environments that stay reliable and cost-effective as usage grows. Clear architecture, solid monitoring, and choices that age well.

process_steps_full.title: Assessment
process_steps_full.desc: We review your current estate, dependencies, and goals to design a migration path that fits your timeline and risk.

process_steps_full.title: Migration Planning
process_steps_full.desc: We define phases, priorities, and cutover strategy so your business keeps running throughout the move.

process_steps_full.title: Migration & Operation
process_steps_full.desc: We execute the move and hand over runbooks, cost controls, and monitoring so you can run it well long term.

process_steps_full.title: Optimization
process_steps_full.desc: We help you tune cost, performance, and reliability as usage and requirements evolve.

detailed_services.title: Cloud Assessment
detailed_services.desc: We review your current infrastructure and design a migration path that fits your timeline and risk tolerance.

detailed_services.title: Cloud Migration
detailed_services.desc: We move your workloads in phases so your business keeps running-no big-bang cutover unless you want one.

detailed_services.title: Cloud Operations
detailed_services.desc: We help you run the cloud well: cost control, reliability, and clear visibility so you can focus on building.

cloud.value_heading: Cloud that scales with you, not against you
cloud.value_para: Every cloud decision is aligned with your actual workloads and growth. We avoid over-provisioning and focus on architecture that stays understandable and cost-effective as you scale.
cloud.cta_heading: Ready to move or optimize your cloud?
cloud.cta_subtext: Let's discuss your cloud strategy and identify practical steps that fit your timeline and goals.

network.title: Network
network.banner_tagline: From office and campus to secure remote access-we design and run networks that stay up and keep your teams connected.
network.subtitle: From office and campus networks to secure remote access-we design and run networks that stay up and keep your teams connected.

process_steps.title: Implementation

process_steps.title: Monitoring

network.trust_bar_text: Trusted by enterprises, retail, healthcare, and education to design and run networks that stay up and keep teams connected.

security.title: Security
security.banner_tagline: From assessment and hardening to 24/7 monitoring and compliance-we help you stay secure and audit-ready.
security.subtitle: We help you lock down systems, stay compliant, and respond quickly when something doesn’t look right-so you can run with confidence.

process_steps.title: Assessment
process_steps.desc: We find where you're exposed and what compliance asks for, then lay out a plan that’s realistic and actionable.

process_steps.title: Implementation
process_steps.desc: We put controls and policies in place so security is built in, not bolted on.

process_steps.title: Monitoring
process_steps.desc: We watch for threats and anomalies and help you respond so small issues don’t become big ones.

security.trust_bar_text: Trusted by fintech, healthcare, and SaaS companies to lock down systems, stay compliant, and respond quickly when something doesn't look right.
security.expert_heading: Security that lets you run with confidence
security.expert_para: We help teams identify exposure, implement controls, and monitor for threats so security is built in-and you can respond quickly when something doesn't look right.
expert_bullets: Controls built in, not bolted on

process_steps_full.desc: We find where you're exposed and what compliance asks for, then lay out a plan that's realistic and actionable.

backup.title: Backup &
backup.banner_tagline: Clear RTO/RPO, tested recovery, and runbooks that stay current-so you're ready when the worst happens.
backup.subtitle: We make sure your data is backed up, recoverable, and safe from ransomware-so when the worst happens, you’re ready.

process_steps.title: Assessment
process_steps.desc: We figure out what you need to protect, how fast you need it back, and what’s already in place.

process_steps.title: Implementation
process_steps.desc: We set up backup and run real recovery tests so you know it works when it matters.

process_steps.title: Maintenance
process_steps.desc: We watch backups, fix failures, and keep your runbooks and plans up to date.

migration.title: Cloud &
migration.banner_tagline: Phased, low-risk moves to the cloud with a clear path-so you can turn off the old stuff when you're ready.
migration.subtitle: We move your workloads to the cloud in a way that fits your business-phased, low-risk, and with a clear path to turning off the old stuff.

process_steps.title: Discovery
process_steps.desc: We map what you have, what depends on what, and build a migration plan that you can actually execute.

process_steps.title: Migration
process_steps.desc: We move in waves, test at each step, and keep rollback options so you’re never one mistake away from a crisis.

process_steps.title: Optimization
process_steps.desc: We tune cost and performance in the cloud and help you safely shut down the old environment.
